Hi,

Does anyone know whether I can specify which directory
a junit test wi=
ll run in.  

Let me elaborate a little.

I'm using Maven to run the tests,=
 but in this case I want the 
test to think that it is running in a directo=
ry "src/test/output"
relative to the directory that the tests are launced f=
rom.

In other words I want the JUnit test to think it is being run from

$=
basedir/src/test/output, when I'm really running it from $basedir.

The com=
ponent I'm testing creates directories, so my end goal is to
have that comp=
onent create the directories relative to

$basedir/src/test/output
 
Thanks=
,
- Ole
